info.title: Client API of Casper Node
info.description: This describes the JSON-RPC 2.0 API of a node on the Casper network.

methods.name: account_put_deploy
methods.summary: receives a Deploy to be executed by the network

methods.name: info_get_deploy
methods.summary: returns a Deploy from the network

execution_results.description: The map of block hash to execution result.

methods.name: info_get_peers
methods.summary: returns a list of peers connected to the node

peers.description: The node ID and network address of each connected peer.

methods.name: info_get_status
methods.summary: returns the current status of the node

starting_state_root_hash.description: The state root hash used at the start of the current session.

peers.description: The node ID and network address of each connected peer.

last_added_block_info.description: The minimal info of the last block from the linear chain.

round_length.description: The next round length if this node is a validator.

next_upgrade.description: Information about the next scheduled upgrade.

methods.name: chain_get_block
methods.summary: returns a Block from the network

methods.name: chain_get_block_transfers
methods.summary: returns all transfers for a Block from the network

methods.name: chain_get_state_root_hash
methods.summary: returns a state root hash at a given Block

state_root_hash.description: Hex-encoded hash of the state root.

methods.name: state_get_item
methods.summary: returns a stored value from the network

schema.description: The path components starting from the key as base.

methods.name: state_get_balance
methods.summary: returns a purse's balance from the network

methods.name: chain_get_era_info_by_switch_block
methods.summary: returns an EraInfo from the network

methods.name: state_get_auction_info
methods.summary: returns the bids and validators as of the most recently added Block

Deploy.description: A deploy; an item containing a smart contract along with the requester's signature(s).

PublicKey.description: Hex-encoded cryptographic public key, including the algorithm tag prefix.

RuntimeArgs.description: Represents a collection of arguments passed to a smart contract.

CLValue.description:
A Casper value, i.e. a value which can be stored and manipulated by smart contracts.

It holds the underlying data as a type-erased, serialized `Vec<u8>` and also holds the CLType of the underlying data as a separate member.

The `parsed` field, representing the original value, is a convenience only available when a CLValue is encoded to JSON, and can always be set to null if preferred.

CLType.description:
Casper types, i.e. types which can be stored and manipulated by smart contracts.

Provides a description of the underlying data type of a [`CLValue`](crate::CLValue).

anyOf.description: `Option` of a `CLType`.
Variable-length list of a single `CLType` (comparable to a `Vec`).
Fixed-length list of a single `CLType` (comparable to a Rust array).
`Result` with `Ok` and `Err` variants of `CLType`s.
Map with keys of a single `CLType` and values of a single `CLType`.
1-ary tuple of a `CLType`.
2-ary tuple of `CLType`s.
3-ary tuple of `CLType`s.

Approval.description: A struct containing a signature and the public key of the signer.

Signature.description: Hex-encoded cryptographic signature, including the algorithm tag prefix.

JsonExecutionResult.description: The execution result of a single deploy.

ExecutionResult.description: The result of executing a single deploy.

anyOf.description: The result of a failed execution.

effect.description: The effect of executing the deploy.

transfers.description: A record of Transfers performed while executing the deploy.

cost.description: The cost of executing the deploy.

error_message.description: The error message associated with executing the deploy.

anyOf.description: The result of a successful execution.

effect.description: The effect of executing the deploy.

transfers.description: A record of Transfers performed while executing the deploy.

cost.description: The cost of executing the deploy.

ExecutionEffect.description: The effect of executing a single deploy.

Operation.description: An operation performed while executing a deploy.

OpKind.description: The type of operation performed while executing a deploy.

TransformEntry.description: A transformation performed while executing a deploy.

Transform.description: The actual transformation performed while executing a deploy.

anyOf.description: Writes the given CLValue to global state.
Writes the given Account to global state.
Writes the given DeployInfo to global state.
Writes the given EraInfo to global state.
Writes the given Transfer to global state.
Writes the given Bid to global state.
Writes the given Withdraw to global state.
Writes the given EraValidators to global state.
Adds the given `i32`.
Adds the given `u64`.
Adds the given `U128`.
Adds the given `U256`.
Adds the given `U512`.
Adds the given collection of named keys.
A failed transformation, containing an error message.

DeployInfo.description: Information relating to the given Deploy.

from.description: Account identifier of the creator of the Deploy.

source.description: Source purse used for payment of the Deploy.

gas.description: Gas cost of executing the Deploy.

EraInfo.description: Auction metadata.  Intended to be recorded at each era.

anyOf.description: Info about a seigniorage allocation for a validator
Info about a seigniorage allocation for a delegator

Transfer.description: Represents a transfer from one purse to another

from.description: Account from which transfer was executed

to.description: Account to which funds are transferred

Bid.description: An entry in the validator map.

bonding_purse.description: The purse that was used for bonding.

staked_amount.description: The amount of tokens staked by a validator (not including delegators).

vesting_schedule.description: Vesting schedule for a genesis validator. `None` if non-genesis validator.

delegators.description: This validator's delegators, indexed by their public keys

Delegator.description: Represents a party delegating their stake to a validator (or "delegatee")

era_of_creation.description: Era in which this unbonding request was created.

delegation_rate.description: Delegation rate of a seigniorage recipient.

key.description: The value of the entry: a casper `Key` type.

PeersMap.description: Map of peer IDs to network addresses.

NextUpgrade.description: Information about the next protocol upgrade.

ActivationPoint.description: The first era to which the associated protocol version applies.

BlockIdentifier.description: Identifier for possible ways to retrieve a block.

anyOf.description: Identify and retrieve the block with its hash.
Identify and retrieve the block with its height.

JsonEraReport.description: Equivocation and reward information to be included in the terminal block.

JsonProof.description: A JSON-friendly representation of a proof, i.e. a block's finality signature.

StoredValue.description:
Representation of a value stored in global state.

`Account`, `Contract` and `ContractPackage` have their own `json_compatibility` representations (see their docs for further info).

anyOf.description: A CasperLabs value.
An account.
A contract's Wasm
Methods and type signatures supported by a contract.
A contract definition, metadata, and security container.
A record of a transfer
A record of a deploy
Auction metadata
A bid
A withdraw
The seignorage recipients.

Account.description: Structure representing a user's account, stored in global state.

ActionThresholds.description: Thresholds that have to be met when executing an action of a certain type.

Contract.description: A contract struct that can be serialized as  JSON object.

ContractPackageHash.description: The hash address of the contract package

ContractWasmHash.description: The hash address of the contract wasm

EntryPoint.description: Type signature of a method. Order of arguments matter since can be referenced by index as well as name.

EntryPointAccess.description: Enum describing the possible access control options for a contract entry point (method).

anyOf.description: Only users from the listed groups may call this method. Note: if the list is empty then this method is not callable from outside the contract.

Group.description: A (labelled) "user group". Each method of a versioned contract may be assoicated with one or more user groups which are allowed to call it.

ContractPackage.description: Contract definition, metadata, and security container.

ContractHash.description: The hash address of the contract

state_root_hash.description: Hex-encoded hash of the state root

AuctionState.description: Data structure summarizing auction contract data.

bids.description: All bids contained within a vector.

JsonEraValidators.description: The validators for the given era.

JsonBids.description: A Json representation of a single bid.

JsonBid.description: An entry in a founding validator map representing a bid.

bonding_purse.description: The purse that was used for bonding.

staked_amount.description: The amount of tokens staked by a validator (not including delegators).

JsonDelegator.description: A delegator associated with the given validator.
